snippet: President Obama is sending the nominations of Caitlin Halligan and Sri Srinivasan to the Senate, which so far has blocked him from naming anyone to the powerful District of Columbia appeals court.
abstract: President Obama is sending the nominations of Caitlin Halligan and Sri Srinivasan to the Senate, which so far has blocked him from naming anyone to the powerful District of Columbia appeals court.

headline.main: Obama Nominates Two to Appeals Court
